page.title: 11RAIL AND ROAD SERVICES
page.content: Westbury is a well known railway junction.The main line to London runs to the east and to the west the lines go to Taunton,Exeter,Paignton and Plymouth.North one can go to Bristol via Trowbridge and Bath.To the south and southwest there are trains to Weymouth,Dorchester,Salisbury,Southamp ton and Portsmouth. A National Express long-distance coach service runs daily to London with stops at Chippenham,Swindon and Heathrow.Local'bus services go to Trowbridge,Warminster,Salisbury Bath and Bristol.There is a limited service from Devizes via Westbury to Trowbridge
